Hi: Just downloaded JUnit; can't wait to use it but....
 
I can get TestRunner to work ( using the awtui interface ) BUT it
throws 'Class not found junit.samples.AllTests"' - like others in this
group.
 
I realize the AllTests class isn't in the jar. And I've tried LOTS of
CLASSPATHS. Here my best guess - that doesn't work:
 
The wndows 2k directories are 
C:
    J2SDK_Forte
        junit3.7
            junit
                samples
                tests
 
the Win2k User Environment variables are:
JUNIT_HOME=C:\J2SDK_Forte\junit3.7
CLASSPATH=.;%JUNIT_HOME%\junit.jar;%JUNIT_HOME%\;   etc
 
Test Runner works but fails to find the AllTests.class which I can see
in the samples dir.
 
I've spent a lot of time on this. Hope someone can point out my error.
Thanks, Clif
